revised_title: Observations of Jupiter's First Satellite Immersions and Emersions
tldr: This article presents observations of the immersions and emersions of Jupiter's first satellite made at Funchal, Madeira, using a reflecting telescope. The observations were conducted by Mr. Short and Mr. Bird, with the help of a pendulum clock, and recorded by Thomas Heberden. The data collected was used to calculate the differences in meridian and other astronomical measurements.
